title: LEASE NOW
posting_body: ["Tucked away in Southwest Las Vegas Mountain's Edge neighborhood, Mountain Gate & Mountain Trails are here to offer residents a fresh take on luxury living.", 'Updated with modern finishes and designer touches, our 1 & 2 bedroom apartments for rent near Exploration Peak Park supply just the retreat youve been searching for.', '-Move-in Deposit Free with Jetty', '-Close to the Las Vegas Strip', '-Free WiFi Access in Common Areas', '-Regular Community Events with Friendly Staff', '-Business Center with Workstations and WiFi', '-Mountain Views', '-Our apartment homes are cleaned only with organic products!', '-Two Entertainment Plazas Featuring a Pool, Spa, and Private Cabanas', "-Located in Mountain's Edge Master Planned Community", '-Two Vibrant Clubhouses with Plasma TV/DVD Player and Java Bar', '-Two Outdoor Lounges with Fireplace', '-EV Charging Station', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
